member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.IResponseCache.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the cached response for the given key, if it exists. If no cached response exists for the given key, null is returned.
member.param: The cache key to look up.
member.returns: The response cache entry if it exists; otherwise null.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.IResponseCache.Set(System.String,Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.IResponseCacheEntry,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Stores the given response in the response cache.
member.param: The cache key to store the response under.
The response cache entry to store.
The amount of time the entry will be kept in the cache before expiring, relative to now.

member.summary: Determine whether a cache lookup is allowed for the incoming HTTP request.

member.summary: Determine whether storage of the response is allowed for the incoming HTTP request.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.IResponseCachingPolicyProvider.IsResponseCacheable(Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingContext)
member.summary: Determine whether the response received by the middleware can be cached for future requests.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.IResponseCachingPolicyProvider.IsCachedEntryFresh(Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingContext)
member.summary: Determine whether the response retrieved from the response cache is fresh and can be served.
member.returns: true if the cached entry is fresh; otherwise false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingOptions
member.summary: Options for configuring the .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingOptions.SizeLimit
member.summary: The size limit for the response cache middleware in bytes. The default is set to 100 MB. When this limit is exceeded, no new responses will be cached until older entries are evicted.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingOptions.MaximumBodySize
member.summary: The largest cacheable size for the response body in bytes. The default is set to 64 MB. If the response body exceeds this limit, it will not be cached by the .

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingOptions.UseCaseSensitivePaths
member.summary: true if request paths are case-sensitive; otherwise false. The default is to treat paths as case-insensitive.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.ResponseCachingOptions.SystemClock
member.summary: For testing purposes only.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.StreamUtilities.BodySegmentSize
member.summary: The segment size for buffering the response body in bytes. The default is set to 80 KB (81920 Bytes) to avoid allocations on the LOH.

member.name: T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm
member.summary: Provides support for efficiently using Tasks to implement the APM (Begin/End) pattern.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.Begin(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Marshals the Task as an IAsyncResult, using the supplied callback and state to implement the APM pattern.
member.param: The callback to be invoked upon completion.
The state to be stored in the IAsyncResult.
member.returns: An IAsyncResult to represent the task's asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.End(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Processes an IAsyncResult returned by Begin.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.End``1(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Processes an IAsyncResult returned by Begin.

member.name: T:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.TaskAsyncResult
member.summary: Provides a simple IAsyncResult that wraps a Task.
member.remarks: We could use the Task as the IAsyncResult if the Task's AsyncState is the same as the object state, but that's very rare, in particular in a situation where someone cares about allocation, and always using TaskAsyncResult simplifies things and enables additional optimizations.

member.name: F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.TaskAsyncResult._task
member.summary: The wrapped Task.

member.name: F:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.TaskAsyncResult._callback
member.summary: Callback to invoke when the wrapped task completes.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.TaskAsyncResult.#ctor(System.Threading.Tasks.Task,System.Object,System.AsyncCallback)
member.summary: Initializes the IAsyncResult with the Task to wrap and the associated object state.
member.param: Callback to invoke when the wrapped task completes.

member.name: M:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.TaskAsyncResult.InvokeCallback
member.summary: Invokes the callback.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.TaskAsyncResult.AsyncState
member.summary: Gets a user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.TaskAsyncResult.CompletedSynchronously
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation completed synchronously.
member.remarks: This is set lazily based on whether the has completed by the time this object is created.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.TaskAsyncResult.IsCompleted
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation has completed.

member.name: P:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskToApm.TaskAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle
member.summary: Gets a that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.
